p: Analyses were performed with R 3.4 [ 34] with packages limma and heatmap3 [ 35, 36]. Weighted linear least squares regression was used for assay calibration with weights 1/titer and 1/titer min for blanks. Predictions below 0 or larger than 1000 were set to 0 and 1000, respectively.
